Description: Lower portion of a limestone pyramidion bearing the cartouches and serekhs of a King Intef, prenomen Sekhemrawepmaat.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM 4: Plate 29 PM I Part 2: p.603 D. Polz, Der Begin des Neuen Reiches, SDAIK 31 (2007), pp. 133-138, pl. 19-20
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (pl.29)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2016 8 Mar-12 Jun, Cleveland, Cleveland Museum of Art, Pharoah: King of Egypt 2018 7 Jun-16 Sep, Barcelona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2018-2019 16 Oct-20 jan, Madrid, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt
Associated names: Named in inscription: Sekhemre-wepmaat Intef V
